00018 #include "cswordtreekey.h"
00019 #include "cswordbookmoduleinfo.h"
00020 
00021 CSwordTreeKey::CSwordTreeKey( const CSwordTreeKey& k ) : TreeKeyIdx(k), CSwordKey(k) {
00022 }
00023 
00024 CSwordTreeKey::CSwordTreeKey( const TreeKeyIdx *k, CSwordModuleInfo* module )
00025     : TreeKeyIdx(*k), CSwordKey(module) {
00026 }
00027 
00028 CSwordTreeKey* CSwordTreeKey::copy() const {
00029     return new CSwordTreeKey(*this);
00030 }
00031 
00033 const QString CSwordTreeKey::key( ){
00034   return QString::fromLocal8Bit( getFullName() ); //don't use fromUtf8
00035 }
00036 
00037 void CSwordTreeKey::key( const QString& newKey ){
00038   if (newKey.isEmpty()) {
00039 //    qWarning("go to root!");
00040     root();
00041   }
00042   else
00043     TreeKeyIdx::operator = ((const char*)newKey.local8Bit());       //don't use Utf8! Doesn't work with umlauts!    
00044     
00045   if (Error())
00046         root();
00047 }
00048 
00049 void CSwordTreeKey::key( const char* newKey ){
00050     if (newKey) {
00051         TreeKeyIdx::operator = (newKey);
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 CSwordModuleInfo* const CSwordTreeKey::module( CSwordModuleInfo* const newModule ){
00056     if (newModule && newModule != m_module && newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook ) {
00057         CSwordBookModuleInfo* bookModule = dynamic_cast<CSwordBookModuleInfo*>(newModule);
00058         m_module = newModule;
00059         copyFrom(*(bookModule->tree()));
00060         root();
00061     }
00062     return m_module;
00063 }
00064 
00066 CSwordTreeKey& CSwordTreeKey::operator = (const QString& keyname ){
00067   key(keyname);
00068   return *this;
00069 }
